languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} inflicts a damage-over-time effect on a target which is already suffering from an effect of the same type, the target immediately suffers an additional instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the initial effect. All damage-over-time effects of this type on this target (including the one just inflicted and the ones that will possibly be inflicted later) have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: When Executioner applies a DoT to a target, and the target already has that type of DoT, the DoT damage is instantly applied and all DoTs of this type on the target increase their damage by {uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}. Stacks.

Whenever the Executioner applies a damage-over-time effect to a target which is already under an effect of the same type, the target immediately suffers an additional instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the initial effect. All damage-over-time effects of this type on this target (including the one just applied and the ones that will possibly be applied later) have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}. This bonus stacks.

Whenever the Executioner applies a damage-over-time effect to a target which is already under an effect of the same type, the target immediately suffers an additional instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the initial effect. All damage-over-time effects of this type on this target (including the one just applied and the ones that will possibly be applied later) have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}. This bonus stacks.

Whenever the Executioner inflicts a damage-over-time effect on a target which is already suffering from an effect of the same type, the target immediately suffers an additional instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the initial effect. All damage-over-time effects of this type on this target (including the one just inflicted and the ones that will possibly be inflicted later) have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}. This bonus stacks.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} inflicts a damage-over-time effect on a target which is already suffering from an effect of the same type, the target immediately suffers an additional instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the initial effect. All damage-over-time effects of this type on this target (including the one just inflicted and the ones that will possibly be inflicted later) have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} inflige un efecto de daño continuado a un objetivo que ya sufre un efecto del mismo tipo, el objetivo recibe de inmediato una aplicación adicional del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} del efecto inicial. El nivel de todos los efectos de daño continuado de este tipo del objetivo (incluyendo el que acaba de recibir y los que pueda recibir más tarde) aumenta en +{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}. Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} es acumulativa.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} inflicts a damage-over-time effect on a target which is already suffering from an effect of the same type, the target immediately suffers an additional instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the initial effect. All damage-over-time effects of this type on this target (including the one just inflicted and the ones that will possibly be inflicted later) have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} inflige un efecto de daño continuado a un objetivo que ya sufre un efecto del mismo tipo, el objetivo recibe de inmediato una aplicación adicional del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} del efecto inicial. El nivel de todos los efectos de daño continuado de este tipo del objetivo (incluyendo el que acaba de recibir y los que pueda recibir más tarde) aumenta en +{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}. Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} es acumulativa.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}が同じタイプの効果を受けている敵に継続ダメージ効果を与えるたび、ターゲットは即座に元の効果から追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。このターゲットのこのタイプのすべての継続ダメージ効果（与えられたばかりのものと今後与えられる可能性があるものを含める）は、そのレベルが+{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}増加する。この{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} inflicts a damage-over-time effect on a target which is already suffering from an effect of the same type, the target immediately suffers an additional instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the initial effect. All damage-over-time effects of this type on this target (including the one just inflicted and the ones that will possibly be inflicted later) have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}が同じタイプの効果を受けている敵に継続ダメージ効果を与えるたび、ターゲットは即座に元の効果から追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。このターゲットのこのタイプのすべての継続ダメージ効果（与えられたばかりのものと今後与えられる可能性があるものを含める）は、そのレベルが+{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}増加する。この{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}はスタックする。

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}对目标施加持续伤害效果时，如果该目标已经受到了同种类型的持续伤害效果，则立刻对目标造成原本持续伤害效果的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。除此之外，对该目标继续施加同种类型的持续伤害效果时（包括刚刚造成的持续伤害效果，以及之后可能会造成的效果），该效果的强度等级提高{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}级，此{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} inflicts a damage-over-time effect on a target which is already suffering from an effect of the same type, the target immediately suffers an additional instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the initial effect. All damage-over-time effects of this type on this target (including the one just inflicted and the ones that will possibly be inflicted later) have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}对目标施加持续伤害效果时，如果该目标已经受到了同种类型的持续伤害效果，则立刻对目标造成原本持续伤害效果的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。除此之外，对该目标继续施加同种类型的持续伤害效果时（包括刚刚造成的持续伤害效果，以及之后可能会造成的效果），该效果的强度等级提高{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}级，此{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}效果可叠加。

languages.text: Belegt der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} ein Ziel, das bereits mit einem Effekt desselben Typs belegt ist, mit einem Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekt, erleidet das Ziel sofort eine weitere Instanz {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} des ursprünglichen Effektes. Alle Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte dieses Typs, mit denen dieses Ziel belegt ist (einschließlich des aktuellen Effektes und möglicher zukünftiger Effekte) haben eine um +{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8} höhere Stufe. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} ist stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} inflicts a damage-over-time effect on a target which is already suffering from an effect of the same type, the target immediately suffers an additional instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the initial effect. All damage-over-time effects of this type on this target (including the one just inflicted and the ones that will possibly be inflicted later) have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: Belegt der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} ein Ziel, das bereits mit einem Effekt desselben Typs belegt ist, mit einem Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekt, erleidet das Ziel sofort eine weitere Instanz {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} des ursprünglichen Effektes. Alle Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte dieses Typs, mit denen dieses Ziel belegt ist (einschließlich des aktuellen Effektes und möglicher zukünftiger Effekte) haben eine um +{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8} höhere Stufe. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} ist stapelbar.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} inflige un effet de dégâts progressifs à une cible qui souffre déjà d'un effet de ce type, cette dernière subit immédiatement une instance de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaire de l'effet initial. Les effets de dégâts progressifs de ce type sur cette cible (présents et futurs) voient leur niveau augmenté de +{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} est cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} inflicts a damage-over-time effect on a target which is already suffering from an effect of the same type, the target immediately suffers an additional instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the initial effect. All damage-over-time effects of this type on this target (including the one just inflicted and the ones that will possibly be inflicted later) have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} inflige un effet de dégâts progressifs à une cible qui souffre déjà d'un effet de ce type, cette dernière subit immédiatement une instance de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaire de l'effet initial. Les effets de dégâts progressifs de ce type sur cette cible (présents et futurs) voient leur niveau augmenté de +{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} est cumulable.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} накладывает эффект периодического урона на цель, на которую уже действует эффект того же типа, эта цель немедленно получает внеочередной {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от действующего на нее эффекта. Для всех эффектов периодического урона данного типа на цели (включая наложенный только что и те, что будут наложены потом) уровень повышается на {uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}. Этот {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} суммируется.

All damage-over-time effects of this type on this target (including the one just inflicted and the ones that will possibly be inflicted later) have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}. Этот {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} суммируется.

Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} накладывает эффект периодического урона на цель, на которую уже действует эффект того же типа, эта цель немедленно получает внеочередной {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от действующего на нее эффекта.
